post.title: Sony Music Entertainment Japan Teases VEE Project’s Dev-c Generation
post.content:
Sony Music Entertainment Japan has teased the debut of a new VTuber lineup under VEE Project. The third unit, dubbed ‘Dev-c’ will debut on August 26, 2022, with each talent allotted their own debut time on said day.

Dev-c is composed of talents Aomiya Yozuri, Uriyone, Uparu, Luminous Amaama, and TwiCoto. Catch their debut schedules here:

  • Aomiya Yozuri (18:00 JST)
  • Uriyone (18:45 JST)
  • Uparu (19:30 JST)
  • Luminous Amaama (20:15 JST)
  • TwiCoto (21:00 JST)

／
　#すすむぜVEE
　Dev-c初配信まとめ
＼

8月26日(金)にリレー初配信✨

■18:00〜
蒼宮よづり@aomiyayozuri

■18:45〜
糶@URIYONEE

■19:30〜
亞生うぱる@UPARU_JP

■20:15〜
るみなす・すいーと@luminous_amaama

■21:00〜
言のハ@TwiCoto

▼詳しくはこちら！https://t.co/Qz8ASDkoZG https://t.co/AbEwaULW5v

— VEE【公式】 (@_vee_official_) August 22, 2022

Currently, there are two waves within the VEE Project, namely Dev-a (Otokado Ruki, Tulsi-Nightmare Madness IV, Hinahoshi Airu, Kujo Ringo, Syusetu Kohaku) and Dev-b (Audrey Mina, Oshiro Ito, Sazanami Toa, Hiyori Chihiyo, Mew Garcia, and retired talent Shindouji Ako)

Other VTuber projects under the Sony Music Entertainment Japan brand include VERSE, Cinderella Project, and PRISM Project.

Photo from VEE / Illustration: kodamazon

post.description: Dev-c is composed of talents Aomiya Yozuri, Uriyone, Uparu, Luminous Amaama, and TwiCoto. Catch their debut on August 26, 2022.
